LEO-NET 2025

The 3rd ACM Workshop on LEO Networking and Communication 2025

Previous Editions

LEO-NET has been bringing together researchers and practitioners to explore the challenges and opportunities in LEO satellite networking since 2023.

LEO-NET 2024

The second workshop was held in conjunction with ACM SIGCOMM 2024, continuing to advance the field of LEO satellite networking and communication research.

LEO-NET 2023

The inaugural workshop established LEO-NET as a premier venue for discussing the latest developments in low earth orbit satellite networks and their applications.
